name: @aragon/kits-bare
description: Generic kit for deploying and setting up a DAO with one app
author: Aragon One AG <contact@aragon.one>

scripts.publish:rpc: aragon apm publish BareKit --network rpc --init $(npm run deploy:fac:rpc | tail -n 1) @ARAGON_ENS
scripts.deploy:fac:rpc: aragon contracts compile --all --network rpc && aragon contracts exec --network rpc scripts/deploy-dao-factory.js
